summary: A specialized neural network model that leverages the LayoutLMv2 architecture to perform token-level classification on document images, combining textual, visual, and layout information to assign labels such as entity types to each token.
business_intent: Automate the extraction of structured data from scanned or digital documents (e.g., invoices, forms, contracts) by identifying and labeling relevant text segments, thereby reducing manual data entry and improving information retrieval workflows.
